content:
50 AAG Harmeet Dhillon and the Investigation of Violence at Berkeley posted 15 hours ago by Belleoffreedom 2 comments award share report block AAGHarmeetDhillon @AAGDhillon • 1d Mob assault and thuggish intimidation of attendees exercising their First Amendment rights are unacceptable. The @CivilRights Division, under @AGPamBondi, is initiating a full investigation into the potential failures at UC Berkeley and any who enabled such violence.
2 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Belleoffreedom OP 3 points 15 hours ago https://x.com/AAGDhillon/status/1988361125684007147?s=20 This is a letter that requires the administrators at Berkeley to do work. Corresponding statement from US Attorney General Pam Bondi https://x.com/AGPamBondi/status/1988339354754769099?s=20 permalink award report block reply Calumet57 1 points 15 hours ago Action is good but... Failures?  Who enabled violence? How about the asshole caught on camera assaulting the dude? permalink award report block reply
